ARK Server rules.

1. Be Kind: You must respect all users, regardless of your liking towards them. Treat others the way you want to be treated.

2. No Inappropriate Language: The use of profanity should be kept to a minimum. However, any derogatory language towards any user is prohibited.

3. No Bluetagging: Do not join others tribe just to grief and/or take their items.

4. No Mesh Building: Do not build bases and/or stashes inside of the mesh, unattainable to others.

5. No Spawn-Turrets: Do not place turrets close to spawnpoints.

6. No Building On Obelisk: Do not build on and/or around obelisks.

7. Build Spamming: Keep the foundationspamming to a minimum, do not randomly run around placing foundations etc.

8. Passive Tames: It is unnecessary to kill passive tames.
